page.title: 17THE PROPOSED BYPASS
page.content: There are two proposed lines for the bypass. Line B and line F. They both start and finish at the same point. The nearest the lines get to Locharbriggs is Bloomfield. Line B is much preferred because it is concerned about taking more traffic away from the town. There will be less traffic going through Locharbriggs, lorries etc from the factories will not have to come through the town. They can go straight onto the bypass. Holiday makers coming from the north and south will travel straight onto the bypass and this will stop traffic jams in the town.
